# Residuals
```{r results='asis'}
models = names(results)

for(ii in 1:length(models)) {
  cat('### Model: ',correct_names(models[ii]))
  cat('\n\n')
  plot_resids_md(other_vars,results,models[ii])
  cat('\n\n')
  cat('\n\n\\newpage')
  cat('\n\n')
}
```
